name: Elicere, Inc.
tagline: Senior Level IT Solutions For Your Needs
description:
ELICERE was established in the Spring of 2006 with a vision built on core principles that are essential for any successful business: Establish trust, build relationships, understand our customer's needs, employ good business practices, and deliver a quality product solution.
It is our mission to elicit your needs and requirements in a proactive manner so that each customized application we build for you addresses all of your needs and concerns.
